derivation: from H8104 (שָׁמַר) in the original sense of pricking;
outline:
1. thorn(s), adamant, flint
    1. thorns, thorn-bushes
    2. adamant (as sharp)
    3. a sharp stone, flint
      1. perhaps a diamond
strongs_def: a thorn; also (from its keenness for scratching) a gem, probably the diamond
